subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Arkansas put Coach Bobby Petrino on paid leave Thursday after he failed to disclose he had been riding with a female employee half his age when his motorcycle skidded off the road over the weekend.
snippet: Arkansas put Coach Bobby Petrino on paid leave Thursday after he failed to disclose he had been riding with a female employee half his age when his motorcycle skidded off the road over the weekend.
